summary: Completed comprehensive e2e testing for Private After Dark app. All backend API tests (20/20) passed. All frontend UI tests passed. Landing page renders correctly with all sections, language toggle works (EN/ES/FR/AR with RTL for Arabic), character cards show unique personalities, pricing shows correct tiers ($0/$19/$39), checkout redirect works, payment success/cancel pages render correctly.
passed_tests: /api/voice/status returns enabled=true with Edge TTS provider
Landing page hero section renders correctly
Arabic translation works with RTL layout
Character cards display for Valeria (dominant), Luna (emotional), Nyx (dark)
Chat with character buttons have correct deep links
Footer Telegram button links to bot
/payment-success page renders correctly (shows error state without session_id)
/payment-cancel page renders with Return Home and View Plans buttons
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features verified: 1) Landing page with hero, characters (Valeria=dominant, Luna=emotional, Nyx=dark), pricing ($0/$19/$39), FAQ, referral, privacy sections 2) Language toggle EN/ES/FR/AR with RTL for Arabic 3) Character cards with deep links to @MidnightDesireAi_bot 4) Checkout redirect creates Stripe sessions 5) Payment pages at /payment-success and /payment-cancel 6) Voice status endpoint confirms VIP-only features (Edge TTS provider, 3 characters, 3 styles, 4 languages)
